content:
Got it!

So, let's calculate the average monthly cost of Max's supplies:

**Recurring expenses:**

1. Grain-free kibble: $50/month
2. Dental chews: $10/month

Total recurring expenses: $50 + $10 = $60/month

**One-time expenses:**

1. Dog bed: $40 (one-time expense, not included in monthly average)

Since the dog bed was a one-time expense, we won't include it in the monthly average.

So, the average monthly cost of Max's supplies is **$60**.

Does this look about right to you? Are there any other expenses you've been tracking that we haven't accounted for?
